articles.title: Some vaccinated Americans have lost their patience with those refusing the shot as Covid-19 cases surge and mandates return - CNN
articles.description: With Covid-19 cases and hospitalizations now surging again and officials across the US suddenly reimposing restrictions after a summer of semi normalcy, many vaccinated Americans are becoming increasingly angry at those who won't get vaccinated.
